commit message: BitBoat: show the spinner immediately after confirming the ToS
stop polling BitBoat on inactivity to avoid unnecessary server load and battery drain
Fixed 'bits' unit for BitBoat list view
move min version to 14 as per dependencies and avoid repeating versionCode
repeat versionCode in build.gradle (otherwise it breaks F-Droid)
Changed wg/scrypt entry in .gitmodules for Travis
update deps and instructions in README
Google Authenticator fixes (crashes, missing text code, non-numeric input)

1.44 release

- fixed a crash when setting up Google Authenticator
- BitBoat user interface fixes
